listMessages.description: Lists an Messages via Bird Channels API

props.name: status
props.description: The status of the messages to filter by (select "All" for all statuses)

props.name: startAt
props.description: The start date and time (in UTC) to filter messages

props.name: endAt
props.description: The end date and time (in UTC) to filter messages, should not exceed 7 days from start date

props.name: pageToken
props.description: Token for pagination to fetch next set of results after 1000 messages

send-sms.description: Sends an SMS message via Bird Channels API.

props.name: recipient
props.description: The phone number to send the message to (with country code)

props.name: message
props.description: The body of the SMS message

props.name: reference
props.description: Your own identifier for the message (optional)

props.name: scheduledFor
props.description: Message to be sent at a specific datetime eg. 2025-04-27T15:08:18.613Z. If not set, the message will be sent immediately.
